name: @woke/oracle
description: Tiny oracle for Twitter API to avoid waiting for Oraclize

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production ETH_ENV=production WOKE_ROLE=oracle DEBUG=* node src/index.js
scripts.start:docker: ETH_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development CONTEXT=local DEBUG_RECOVERY=true DEBUG=* node src/index.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development ETH_ENV=development PERSIST=false CONTEXT=local DEBUG=*,twitter node src/index.js

author: Jackson Virgo
